parley.change-color: You're lacking in colors. Perhaps we could change that ?
parley.freaking-face: I've got a freaking face and all ! Isn't that cool enough ?!
parley.greetings: Hi there ! Gosh, it's been a while ! What's happening ?
parley.greetings-alt: Hi again. Is there something else ?
parley.no-mane: Looks like I was too lazy to give you a mane...
parley.rep1: You're damn right, "it's been a while" ! It's about time we get to work, isn't it ?
parley.rep2: Well, I've been pretty busy... but lately, I had an illumination of sorts, and I decided to see this thing to the end.
parley.rep3: Let's cut to the chase. Show me something cool

medicine-skill.in-combat: You can't use medicine during combat
medicine-skill.used-on: {{user}} used medicine on {{target}} and healed it for {{hp}} hit points.
